content: Can anyone share some insights on what the next steps are to enable FHIR support within the audiology domain. Basically, I want to send diagnostic measurements of hearing loss.
Measurements are supported in FHIR by observations generally. Additional domain guidance is done through implementation guides and profiling existing resources.
Discussion should happen in the #implementers stream (for how to) or #social stream (for community building around audioligy and FHIR)
